onboarding_1_description: Manage your work schedule easily and simply. Our app allows you to adjust availability times, accept or decline bookings, and see all planned appointments in one place.
onboarding_2_description: Attract new clients with our app. Your profile will be easy to find, and clients can book your services online, rate, and leave reviews, helping you increase visibility and trust.
onboarding_3_description: Keep track of your income and payments with our built-in payment system. Accept online payments, check payment history, and ensure a fast and secure billing process for your clients.
onboarding_4_description: Manage your beauty business more efficiently and easily than ever before!
login_welcome_description: We are glad to see you again! Please login to use the app.
register_welcome_description: Join our platform and manage your beauty services effortlessly.
forgot_password_description: Please enter your registered email or phone number to start the password recovery process.
email_confirmation_description: Please, enter the code you received in your email
phone_confirmation_description: Please, enter the code you received on your phone
new_password_description: Now you can create a new password and confirm it.
account_setup_business_name_description: This is the brand name that your clients will see. You can add your legal name later.
account_setup_services_description: Select the main service you offer to your clients and up to 3 related services.
account_setup_team_description: That will help us set up the calendar correctly.
account_setup_location_description: Add your location so your clients can easily find you.
register_terms_start: By registering, you agree to our
password_regex_pattern: Password must be at least 8 characters, include an uppercase letter, a lowercase letter, a number, and a special character.
code_resend_notification: The code will be resent after
password_reset_email_sent: Password reset link has been sent to your email {{email}}. Please check your inbox.
error_sending_reset_email: There was an error sending the password reset link. Please try again.
email_already_in_use: This email is already in use
invalid_credential: Login failed. Please check your credentials and try again.
too_many_requests: Access to this account has been temporarily disabled due to many failed login attempts. Try again later
successfull_registration_message: Registration successful! A confirmation link has been sent to your email. Please check your inbox and verify your email address to activate your account.
invalid_web_page_value: Invalid URL format. Ensure it starts with 'www.' and includes a valid domain like '.lv' or '.com'.
no_location: I work remotely, I don't have a location
